participant_1.background:
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes
i have started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
i have never traveled out of the country.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
i hate paying my bills.

participant_2.background:
My worst nightmare is being fired from my internship.
I am a software engineer, but my true passion is geocaching.
I bought my first car for $500, and it was a junker.
i want to have two kids.
i am a grandmother.

content.text: Me too! I am a big fan of manga. What kind of comics do you like?
I like American comics like Marvel and DC. I also like graphic novels.
Graphic novels are great! I like them because they have a lot of story in them.
I agree! I love the way they can tell a story in a different way than a regular novel.
Have you ever heard of geocaching?
It is a treasure hunting game where people use GPS to find hidden containers.
That sounds really cool! I would love to try it.
You should! It is a lot of fun.
Do you know of any good places to go geocaching?
There are a lot of places around here. There is a big geocaching community in our area.
That is great! I would love to meet some of them.
I am sure you would! They are all really friendly people.
I am looking forward to trying geocaching!
